definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
Wuji county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊地區|石家庄地区[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1 di4 qu1], Hebei/The Promise (name of film by Chen Kaige)
Wuji county in Shijiazhuang 石家莊地區|石家庄地区[Shi2 jia1 zhuang1 di4 qu1], Hebei/The Promise (name of film by Chen Kaige)
to make a supreme effort/at all costs
best quality/item of the highest quality/(slang) outrageous/annoying in the extreme/gross/person with these qualities

sentences.english: You can tell the very rich by their evening dress.
sentences.chinese: 你可從夜禮服認出那些極有錢的富人。

sentences.english: Has the special rich fragrance, the feeling in the mouth like abalone, extremely lubricates tastily .
sentences.chinese: 有特別的濃香，口感如鮑魚，極潤滑爽口。

sentences.english: Some materials such as Lotus leaves shed water because they are "superhydrophobic".
sentences.chinese: 有些材料如荷葉灑下水珠因爲它是“極疏水的”。

sentences.english: Application of quadrupole mass-spectrometer in the transfer system for photocathode manufacturing(PC) is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了四極質譜儀在光陰極轉移系統中的應用。

sentences.english: Therefore, Q1 must withstand a gate-to-source voltage higher than this value.
sentences.chinese: 因此，Q1必須經受門源極電壓高於這個值。

sentences.english: Such violent rampages are extremely unusual in China.
sentences.chinese: 這樣的暴力事件在中國極不尋常。

sentences.english: The words of the speaker sank into the mind of his hearers.
sentences.chinese: 演講者的話在聽衆腦中留下極深刻的印象。

sentences.english: The next morning when the sun was in the sky, she discovered something beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 第二天一早，太陽出來了，她發現一些極美的東西。

sentences.english: Contact with water liberates toxic, highly flammable gas.
sentences.chinese: 與水接觸釋放出有毒的，極易燃氣體。

sentences.english: Polar vascular plants have attracted attentions due to the special environment where they grow.
sentences.chinese: 極地維管植物因其所處環境的特殊性而備受關注。

sentences.english: The two sisters are as like as two peas.

sentences.chinese: 各種膚質，極油性皮膚不建議使用。

sentences.english: Electrode selection for oxidation of cerium by cation ion-exchange membran electrolysis in sulfuric acid solution was reported in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 報導了硫酸介質中電解氧化鈰的陰陽極選擇。

sentences.english: Classic one-sided shrug. Translation: I’ve absolutely no confidence of what I just said.
sentences.chinese: 單邊聳肩的動作表示對自己剛纔說的話極不自信。

sentences.english: Very High-Speed, Low-Cost, Quad Operational Amplifier.
sentences.chinese: 極高速，低成本，四路運算放大器。

sentences.english: We come nearest to the great when we are great in humility。
sentences.chinese: 當我們極謙卑時，則幾近於偉大。

definition: (conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
to cut short/extinct/to disappear/to vanish/absolutely/by no means
